column2:
"Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones.
My fears were completely unfounded, then."

"Finding friends with the ARKS Lookup feature,
buying and selling via My Shop..."

"Believe you me, skillful use of visiphones
can help make you a topnotch ARKS op."

"Heh. This reminds me of this one time, in the old
days, when I used a visiphone to... "
